description: The highborn Himemiya Chikane is cool and aloof, the perfect young lady of good breeding. Kurusegawa Himeko is devoted to her, and secretly her friend. Their lives are undisturbed in their school, until an ancient evil suddenly rears its head. To combat it, Chikane and Himeko must take on the roles of shrine maidens of the Moon and Sun.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Super Robot
tags.description: Prominently features large robots often piloted by hot-blooded protagonists.

tags.name: Shrine Maiden
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a shrine maiden.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Nun
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a nun.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

node.description: He is known for playing tough or grouchy men in dubbed anime and video games. His career includes Hotohori in Fushigi Yūgi and Jin in Samurai Champloo. He also played numerous cameos and minor characters in Rurouni Kenshin, in addition to the major character of Hajime Saito. He also does Don Patch in Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo as well as Gabumon and other voices in Digimon.  According to Anime News Network, Thornton has the most credits of any male voice actor and he is second in total voice actor credits only next to Wendee Lee. He has been in nearly two hundred voice-over productions for Japanese animation.  Thornton is also well-known for having played many different minor voice roles throughout the Power Rangers franchise (and similar series such as VR Troopers and Masked Rider).  Thornton has also had experience with ADR direction. Currently, he is co-directing the ADR for the popular anime series Bleach alongside Wendee Lee.

[Blog](http://kaishaku0.blog62.fc2.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kai_Seven_)

Kaishaku consists of artists Hitoshi Ota and Terumasa Shichinohe. The name comes from Kaishakunin (介錯人), an appointed second person whose duty is to decapitate one who commits seppuku (ritual suicide by disembowelment).

[Official Website](https://kotoko.asia) | [Spotify ](https://open.spotify.com/artist/06F1MiFx0dHLHEPQBIrcr9?autoplay=true) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/kotoko-kirakira/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/KOTOKO_Dwarf) | [Warner Home Video](http://whv-amusic.com/kotoko/) | [NBC Universal Japan](http://nbcuni-music.com/kotoko/) | [YouTube ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYZ9uuJYYP5PX8YvpIHbEwQ)

KOTOKO is a Japanese J-pop musician, singer and songwriter. She began her singing career as a member of [I've Sound ](https://anilist.co/staff/106951/Ive) in 2000, and was later signed to Rondorobe under Geneon from 2004 to 2010. Kotoko left Geneon in 2010, left I've Sound and signed to Warner Home Video in 2011. She composes and writes lyrics (for herself as well as other singers in I've Sound) for numerous other song collections. She has contributed songs to numerous anime and video games.

[Website](http://www.pyxie-llc.com/minakubota/) | [Blog](http://minakubota.blog8.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/minakubota)

Mina is a composer and a pianist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mirumodake)

After graduating from an animation school she was working on many productions for Yumeta Company and Studio Deen.

Married to [Tetsuya Yanagisawa](https://anilist.co/staff/109785/).

__Kazuya Takase__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and founder of the sound unit I've Sound, which features the so-called "Love Planet Five", which is composed of 5 prolific singers in the Trance/J-pop industry (KOTOKO, Kaori Utatsuki, Eiko Shimamiya, MELL, and Mami Kawada).  Takase acts as a composer and arranger for the themes and OSTs of various anime and eroge games.

Takase acts as a composer and arranger for the themes and OSTs of various anime and eroge games.

Tomoyuki Nakazawa is a Japanese composer, arranger and music producer. He is a former member of the music unit I've.
